keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.ILGA

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.ILGA.Rule

  • public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents one rule as specified by the OIGA Algorithm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rule()
      Default constructor.
      Rule(int _nAtt)
      Constructor with the number of attributes specified
      Rule(Rule regla)
      Deep-copy constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(Rule s)
      Adds all the antecedents attributes of the rule s to this rule (to perform the IGA)

      Evaluates the inputs and output the class if covered, -1 if not

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rule

        public Rule()

        Default constructor. Does not allocate any memory!

      • Rule

        public Rule(int _nAtt)

        Constructor with the number of attributes specified

        Parameters:
        _nAtt - number of attributes included in this rule

      • Rule

        public Rule(Rule regla)

        Deep-copy constructor

        Parameters:
        regla - original rule

    • Method Detail

      • getActivation

        public boolean getActivation(int att)
        Obtains the activation state of the attribute
        Parameters:
        att - selected attribute from the rule
        Returns:
        True if it is active in the rule, False otherwise

      • getLimits

        public double[] getLimits(int att)
        Returns the bounds of the attribute in the rule
        Parameters:
        att - selected attribute from the rule
        Returns:
        both low and high limits of the attribute in the rule

      • getClas

        public int getClas()

        Returns the class associated to this rule

        Returns:
        the consequent class of the rule

      • setActivation

        public void setActivation(int att,
                          boolean act)
        Sets the activation of the attribute
        Parameters:
        att - attribute selected from the rule
        act - if this attribute will be used or not

      • setLimits

        public void setLimits(int att,
                      double min,
                      double max)
        Sets the new limits of the attribute in the rule
        Parameters:
        att - attribute selected in the rule
        min - new min limit for the attribute
        max - new max limit for the attribute

      • setClass

        public void setClass(int _c)
        Sets the consequent of the rule
        Parameters:
        _c - new class consequent of the rule

      • setLength

        public void setLength(int numAtt)
        Allocates new memory for the number of attributes specified (delete previous memory). The rules will be reset after this!
        Parameters:
        numAtt - new number of attributes of the rule

      • evaluate

        public int evaluate(double[] inputs)
        Evaluates the inputs and output the class if covered, -1 if not
        Parameters:
        inputs - input data of the data set to be classified
        Returns:
        the class obtained if input data is covered by the rule, -1 in other case

      • append

        public void append(Rule s)
        Adds all the antecedents attributes of the rule s to this rule (to perform the IGA)
        Parameters:
        s - all the attributes of this rule will be appended to the present one
